checks.name: slack_bot_invited
checks.description: Check if ClickUp bot is invited to the target Slack channel

checks.name: slack_permission_scope
checks.description: Check if ClickUp app has message.read and channel:history scopes

checks.name: agent_chat_automation
checks.description: Check if agent automation trigger for this channel exists

checks.name: slack_webhook_reachability
checks.description: Check if Slack webhook messages can reach ClickUp Agent endpoint
